resources.string: Welcome to the\n Song Lyric Finder
Select a Song From your Libary
How to use the Song Lyric Finder
This app looks up information about any song in your phone\'s song library.\n\nClick on the button to select a song and get lyrics and information about it.
Could not find the selected song. Please try selecting a different song.
Required permission to read external storage was not granted. Cannot use this feature.

This page shows the following information:

	Song Title
	Song Artist
	Album Name
	Release Date

	Lyrics

Information is from genius.com
